# Chicago Coding Systems

> Chicago Coding Systems has specialized in the research, development, and manufacturing of marking, coding, and labeling technologies for over 60 years. We provide customized solutions for product marking & coding, labeling, and scanning for countless manufacturers across many different industries.

Chicago Coding Systems is a company based in St. Charles, Illinois, with over 60 years of experience. They specialize in custom solutions for product marking & coding, labeling, and scanning for modern manufacturing.

## Pages
https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/: Home page with an overview of services and client testimonials.
https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/about.html: Learn about the company's history, values, and mission.
https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/services.html: Explore detailed descriptions of support, contract labeling, printing, inventory, and consulting services.
https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/solutions.html: Discover marking, coding, labeling, scanning, software, and material handling solutions.
https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/process.html: Understand the company's four-step process: Assessment, Design, Implementation, and Support.
https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/contact.html: Find contact information and ways to get in touch.
https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/audit.html: Request a free production assessment to maximize efficiency.
